adHeader: Year Round Winemaking grapes, instructions, and supplies. Make Wine!
adDetails: If you have thought about making your own wine, but were uncertain on how to get started, this is your chance. We'll deliver in person the grapes, supplies, and know-how to get you started down the path of crafting your own premium wines from some of California's most exclusive vineyards. During the fall harvest we freeze our grapes and juice in 5 gallon pails allowing you to make wine any time of year. We can deliver these grape and juice buckets directly to your front door, along with any supplies or additives you might need. Not sure what supplies or additives you might need? Not a problem. We'll talk you through the entire process and figure out what options are best for you. Best of all, our advice and consulting is always free. Here are some of grapes we currently have available * Chardonnay - Sonoma Coast * Chenin Blanc - Clarksburg * Syrah - Sonoma Valley * Pinot Noir - Sonoma Coast * Cabernet Sauvignon - Suisun Valley * Merlot - Los Carneros * Merlot - Fresno Check out our website for more info and photos - WineGrapesDirect.com
